text: 9.25: Hos 2.23; 1 Pi 2.10Mba Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma Hosea khergi gavar, Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ suaŋgi, “Mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe fhum nan gumgi gu mbigi kegi fhuvara. Gu ntigem khaŋ mbe suanga, ‘Mbe nan gumgi gu mbigi ma.’ Gu mba ntige vuzvugi fhuv ntɨɨri, gu zumgum khaŋ mbe suanga, ‘Nde ntigem gu guigira vuzvugi ntɨɨri ma.’
